description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows kernel elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-43502):

1. Download and apply the KB5044273 update from the official Windows Update catalog.
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure that the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update is relevant for Windows 10 versions 21H2 and 22H2, both for x64 and 32-bit systems.
- Download the update package from: [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273).
- Ensure your system is running one of the affected versions before applying the patch.
- Backup critical data prior to installation to prevent data loss in case of complications during the update.
